meanings.sent1: After washing the clothes, she updried them in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The farmer updried the hay before storing it in the barn.
meanings.sent3: The chef updried the herbs to add flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The artist updried the paint on the canvas before adding more layers.
meanings.sent5: The sun updried the puddles after the rain, leaving the ground dry.

meanings.sent1: The updried towel felt rough against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The updried flowers were ready to be arranged in a vase.
meanings.sent3: The updried wood was perfect for building a sturdy table.
meanings.sent4: The updried paint on the wall gave the room a fresh look.
meanings.sent5: The updried fruit was a delicious snack on the hike.
